default.$description: cursor.default — Standard cursor for non-interactive content. Use for text, containers, and static elements.

interactive.$description: cursor.interactive — Cursor for clickable/interactive elements. Use 'pointer' for buttons, links, and actionable items.

moz.$description: fontSmoothing.moz — Mozilla font smoothing for Firefox. Use for crisp text rendering in heading and body content. Apply to -moz-osx-font-smoothing CSS property.

webkit.$description: fontSmoothing.webkit — WebKit font smoothing for macOS/iOS. Use for crisp, thin text in heading and body text. Apply to -webkit-font-smoothing CSS property.

fontWeight.$description: heading.fontWeight — Default font weight for all headings (h1-h6). Bold (700) provides strong visual hierarchy.

textWrap.$description: heading.textWrap — Text wrapping behavior for headings. 'wrap' allows natural line breaks, 'balance' distributes text more evenly.

scale.$description: scale — Global scale factor for UI components. 1 = default size, 0.8 = 80% size, 1.2 = 120% size. Affects computed dimensions when frameworks support proportional scaling.
